name: ACTIVE
description:
/**
 * Represents an active account status.
 *
 * This status indicates that the account is currently active and in use. The user has full access to all features and functionalities
 * of the application. An active account is fully operational and not restricted in any way.
 */

name: INACTIVE
description:
/**
 * Represents an inactive account status.
 *
 * This status indicates that the account is not currently in use but may be reactivated in the future. The user may have limited
 * access or no access to certain features or functionalities until the account is reactivated.
 */

name: DELETED
description:
/**
 * Represents a deleted account status.
 *
 * This status indicates that the account has been permanently deleted. All data associated with the account has been removed,
 * and the account can no longer be accessed or recovered.
 */

name: RESTRICTED
description:
/**
 * Represents a restricted account status.
 *
 * This status indicates that the account is subject to certain limitations or restrictions. The user may have limited access to
 * certain features or functionalities, possibly due to policy violations or other issues. The account may be under review or
 * subject to further action.
 */
